enableFinalSettlement(uint256,uint256).details: Must be called by the PerpetualV1 admin. The current result of the price oracle must be between the two bounds supplied. Emits the LogFinalSettlementEnabled event.

params.priceLowerBound: The lower-bound (inclusive) of the acceptable price range.
params.priceUpperBound: The upper-bound (inclusive) of the acceptable price range.

setFunder(address).details: Must be called by the PerpetualV1 admin. Emits the LogSetFunder event.

params.funder: The address of the new funder contract.

setGlobalOperator(address,bool).details: Must be called by the PerpetualV1 admin. Emits the LogSetGlobalOperator event.

params.approved: True if approved, false if disapproved.
params.operator: The address for which to enable or disable global operator privileges.

setMinCollateral(uint256).details: Must be called by the PerpetualV1 admin. Emits the LogSetMinCollateral event.

params.minCollateral: The new value of the minimum initial collateralization percentage,                       as a fixed-point number with 18 decimals.

setOracle(address).details: Must be called by the PerpetualV1 admin. Emits the LogSetOracle event.

params.oracle: The address of the new price oracle contract.

withdrawFinalSettlement().details: Emits the LogAccountSettled and LogWithdrawFinalSettlement events.

enableFinalSettlement(uint256,uint256).notice: Enables final settlement if the oracle price is between the provided bounds.

setGlobalOperator(address,bool).notice: Add or remove a Global Operator address.

setMinCollateral(uint256).notice: Sets a new value for the minimum collateralization percentage.

setOracle(address).notice: Sets a new price oracle contract.

withdrawFinalSettlement().notice: Withdraw the number of margin tokens equal to the value of the account at the time that final settlement occurred.

userdoc.notice: Contract allowing the Admin address to set certain parameters.
